opening.question: He tlangval hi tu nge space-a temple siam tura propose tur?
opening.thanks: Zawhna min pek avangin lawmthu ka sawi e.
opening.answer: A chhanna tawi chu artist ka ni tih hi a ni. A sei zawk chu hei hi a ni:

origin.sao_paulo: São Paulo khawpui pawn lamah ka piang a, hlauhawm tih awmzia min zirtir hmasa ber vengah ka piang a. Tunah hian ka sikul ṭhian tam tak chu jail-ah an tang mek a ni. Ka step-father chu jail-ah a awm a. Tharum thawhna hi ka chhiar thin a ni lo va, khawvel ka kal kual a ngai a ni. Tin, tlanchhuah a ngai tih ka hria bawk.
origin.technology: Technology chu ka chhuahna kawng a lo ni ta a ni. Programme ka zir a, tleirawl ka nih laiin electronics ka zir bawk. Code chu hmun danga min hruai thei tur tawng a ni. Technology hmanga hnathawh chu retheihna atanga ka tlanchhuahna a ni.
origin.christianity: Mahse, ka nihna, hmangaihna, rin tur thil ka zawng bawk a, Kristianna ka hmu a, a nih loh leh min hmu ta a ni. Ka pawm a. Ka hmangaih em em a. Khawtlang pakhat ka nei a. Ngaidam, ring, thiltum lian zawk nei tura insawn dun ka zir a.
origin.price: Mahse, a man erawh a to hle thung. Ka la zir loh thil tam tak ka zir bawk. Chuvang chuan chuta tang chuan kei pawh ka tlanchhuak ta a ni.

searching.walls: Wall hian eng nge a tih tih ka hria. Anmahni chu ka hre tawh. I’ve been on both sides: kept out, kept in. A hnua thil thleng chu kum tam tak chhunga ka hming sawi theih loh thil ka zawn chhuahna a ni. Chumi kum chhung chuan Pathian a thi a. Ka zirtir tawh pathian kha, eng pawh ni se, dan leh rorelna nei leh mi thenkhat tan chauh hawn theih kawngkhar nei kha.
searching.art: Heng zawhnate hi chhui chhuah tumin art ka siam tan a: inpawhna leh technology chungchang te, hriatrengna leh thihna chungchang te, tute nge vanram dawng tur tih te. Technology nena kan inzawmna chu ngaihtuah nawn leh thei machine ka siam tan a, i telna, i awmna, i hming, metal leh code atanga thil nung anga inthlak danglam ngai machine te ka siam tan a.

pandemic.intro: Tichuan hripui hian Brazil a rawn nuai ta a ni.
pandemic.government: COVID vaccine an tihkhawtlai lai khan ka sorkar chuan dose khatah dollar khat kickback an inrem a. Damdawi hmanraw tangkai lo nia hriat chu an promote a, mi an thawk harsat laiin an nui a ni. Nitin number danglam takah kan harh thin. Darkar 24 kalta chhung khan mi engzat nge thi? Beisei aia tam nge, a tlem zawk?
pandemic.war: Khawvel hmun chanve chu an hlauthawng a, a chanve dang chu hnialnaah an awm bawk. Indonaah kan awm a, virus nen leh kan inhmangaih tawn a.
pandemic.memorial: Mipui lungngaihna hmun siam ka duh a, chuvangin mi za tam tak nen tangkawpin Memorial Inumeráveis chu ka siam ta a ni. Art leh journalism inzawmna hmuna artwork pakhat. Chhungkaw mi boral tawhte kan interview a. An chan mi nun chanchin kan ziak a. Number chu history-ah kan chantir a. Chu history te nen chuan hla, hla, symphony te siam a ni. Star-te chuan chu thawnthute chu national television-ah an chhiar thin. He project hian mi maktaduai tam tak a thleng a ni.
pandemic.meaning: A pawimawh ber chu a scale a ni lo, thawnthu tin hi hming, nun, tu emaw vanram a nih vang a ni.

discovery.pattern: Lungngaihna nena kan inbiakna sang sawm chuang zet hnuah chuan pattern pakhat a lo chhuak tan ta a ni. Mi thi tawh chanchin kan sawi hian thil tha kan sawi mai mai lo; an thawnthu fragment te chu recommendation lehkha kan ziak ang maiin kan thlang thin. Paradis kawngkhar vengtu hnena rawtna. Kan theihtawp chhuahin pawm theihna hmun, chawlh hahdamna, chawimawina leh hriatrengna hmunah kan tir thin.
discovery.understanding: Tin, engkim tidanglamtu thil pakhat ka hrethiam bawk: Kan biak in sak ngei pawh hian kan hliam tawh a ni. Vanram dawng tlak chungchanga kan rinna hian Leiah hian tute nge kan hnawhchhuah tih hi direct-in a siam a ni. Brazil rama Portuguese colonizers-te chuan Black mite hian thlarau an nei lo niin an ngai a; chu rinna chuan saltanna chu a tidik a ni. Indigenous i nih chuan, hmun dik lovah i piang emaw, mi dik lo i hmangaih emaw a nih chuan vanram kawngkhar chu i tan khar a ni tih an hrilh che a ni.
discovery.birth: Chutiang chuan Orbital Temple chu a lo piang ta a ni.

shaman.secular: Artist tumah hi secular tak tak an ni thei lo. Kan pi leh pute inang, shaman nen hian chatuanin kan inzawm tlat a ni. A tir lamah chuan puk a awm a. Mihringte hian bang chungah rannungte chu chei nan ni lovin, invoke nan an paint a. An zai a, puk chu biak in a lo ni ta a. Shaman chuan ritual thlarau a hmang a; artist chuan art aura a hmang a ni. Kan paint a, kan sculpt a, kan code a, kan hmalam hun duh chu chei nan ni lovin, invoke turin kan design a ni. Art zawng zawng hi thlarau lam thil a ni a, a ni lo tih a sawi lai pawhin.

space.question: Khawiah nge kulh nei lo biak in kan sak theih ang? Hnam leh sakhaw engmahin an claim theih lohna hmun. Pawl pakhat anga kan inngaihtuah theihna hmun.
space.description: Global South atanga lo kal, telna art satellite. Temple in orbit, mi zawng zawng chu tu nge an nih, khawiah nge an pian, tu nge an hmangaih, eng nge an rin tih thliar lovin space-a an hming thawn turin a sawm a ni. Radical inclusion awm theihna hmun, orbit-ah, ramri kaltlanga.
space.mission: He mission hi open source a ni. Technical document tin, code line tin chu zalen takin a awm dawn a, chutiang chuan artist dang, khawtlang dang, hnam dangte pawhin anmahni satellite an siam thei dawn a ni. Chuvangin Global South hian space exploration-ah chauh a tel lo va, a kaihruai a ni.

closing.answer: Chuti a nih chuan he tlangval hi tu nge space-a biak in sak tur? Ka siam lo. Biak in hi hming thawn tura thutlukna siamtu, thianghlim anga hmu, a tak tak ni tura thutlukna siamtu apiangin an sa a ni. Kei hi proposing tu chu ka ni mai. I thutlukna siam chuan nangmah hi i satu i ni.
closing.name: Edson Pavoni chuan a rawn ti a
